queries.description: test join with using clause but join with columns not being selected
test scalar function with STD SQL operator, and scalar function without STD SQL operator can be found properly
queries.sql: SELECT UpPeR(col1), round_deCiMal(col3_r), aDD(pluS(CAST(col3_l AS DOUBLE), CAST(col3_r AS DOUBLE)), CAST(10 AS DOUBLE)) FROM (SELECT {tbl1}.col1 AS col1, {tbl1}.col3 AS col3_l, {tbl2}.col3 AS col3_r FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} USING (col2))

queries.description: test scalar function with STD SQL operator, and scalar function without STD SQL operator can be found properly
queries.sql: SELECT UpPeR(col1), round_deCiMal(col3), pluS(CAST(col3 AS DOUBLE), CAST(10 AS DOUBLE)) FROM {tbl1}

queries.description: test agg function with STD SQL operator works properly
queries.sql: SELECT sUm(col3_r), AvG(col3_r), MAX(PLUS(Add(CAST(col3_l AS DOUBLE), CAST(col3_r AS DOUBLE)), CAST(10 AS DOUBLE))) FROM (SELECT {tbl1}.col1 AS col1, {tbl1}.col3 AS col3_l, {tbl2}.col3 AS col3_r FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} USING (col2))

queries.description: test scalar function with STD SQL operator, and scalar function without STD SQL operator can be found properly
queries.sql: SELECT sUm(col3), AvG(col3), MAX(pluS(CAST(col3 AS DOUBLE), CAST(10 AS DOUBLE))) FROM {tbl1}
